t: LDK Adapted Toys | FAQ | Switch Adapted Toys
s: What are adaptive switches? Adaptive switches are push buttons or buzzers that have an auxiliary cord coming out of them. When the cord is plugged into an adapted device, a child can push the switch to activate the item. This provides a person with limited mobility access to toys and electronics ...
